mapper.insert: insert into system_coin_setting (id, coin_id, level_vip, withdraw_max, withdraw_min, withdraw_fee, withdraw_times, withdraw_day_limit, gmt_create, gmt_modified, version) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coinId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levelVip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{withdrawMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{withdrawMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{withdrawFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{withdrawTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{withdrawDayLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update system_coin_setting set coin_id = #{coinId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level_vip = #{levelVip,jdbcType=INTEGER}, withdraw_max = #{withdrawMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, withdraw_min = #{withdrawMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, withdraw_fee = #{withdrawFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, withdraw_times = #{withdrawTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, withdraw_day_limit = #{withdrawDayLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, coin_id, level_vip, withdraw_max, withdraw_min, withdraw_fee, withdraw_times, withdraw_day_limit, gmt_create, gmt_modified, version from system_coin_setting

select id, coin_id, level_vip, withdraw_max, withdraw_min, withdraw_fee, withdraw_times, withdraw_day_limit, gmt_create, gmt_modified, version from system_coin_setting where coin_id = #{coinId} and level_vip = #{levelVip}
select id, coin_id, level_vip, withdraw_max, withdraw_min, withdraw_fee, withdraw_times, withdraw_day_limit, gmt_create, gmt_modified, version from system_coin_setting where coin_id = #{coinId}
